channel.title: Unlock Blog
channel.description: News and updates from the Web's new business model.

item.title: Smart Contract Upgrade: Version 1.2
item.description: We wanted to start the year with a big release, so we shipped a very large upgrade (the largest since June 2018) to our smart contracts. This new version brings a ton of new features which will eventually bubble up to the Unlock user interfaces (and beyond!).
item.dc:creator: Julien Genestoux

item.title: Forbes Ad Free Experience in the News
item.description: A rundown of a few memorable tweets and press coverage from our Forbes Ad Free Experience Launch
item.dc:creator: Sascha Mombartz

item.title: Unlocking an ads-free Forbes
item.description: Forbes introduced their very first membership today and it lets anyone with an ethereum wallet unlock an ads free experience
item.dc:creator: Julien Genestoux

item.title: Newsletters
item.description: Unlock lets you easily collect email addresses from members to create your own paid-for mailing list, using Ethereum and Non Fungible Tokens
item.dc:creator: Julien Genestoux

item.title: EthCC Tickets
item.description: The largest annual European Ethereum event focused on technology and community is using Unlock for its tickets!
item.dc:creator: Julien Genestoux

item.title: Shipping Documentation
item.description: Helping people get started with Unlock.
item.dc:creator: Akeem Adeniji

item.title: Member Wall
item.description: Showing a list of members has never been easier!
item.dc:creator: Julien Genestoux

item.title: Ejecting an Unlock Account
item.description: Unlock accounts are regular Ethereum accounts. You can easily take it over and use it with your own web3 wallet!
item.dc:creator: Julien Genestoux

item.title: Unlock Hackathon Ideas
item.description: We've put together a bunch of ideas for cool and fun projects that could be hacked on. Take the ideas, run with them, be inspired or do something completely different.
item.dc:creator: Sascha Mombartz

item.title: Unlocking Smart Contracts
item.description: Unlock value-added features directly in your smart contract. Trivial to implement with endless opportunities. We show you how and discuss some reasons why this might be interesting to you.
item.dc:creator: Nick Mancuso

item.title: Ethereum Name Service Support
item.description: Humans are not equiped to make sense of Ethereum addresses, the Ethereum Name Service makes it easy to recognize, remember and type addresses, in a fully decentralized way!
item.dc:creator: Julien Genestoux

item.title: Tokenizing Memberships
item.description: What if there was a new way to interact with the communities you are part of?
item.dc:creator: Julien Genestoux

item.title: Linkdrop: granting keys through links!
item.description: Linkdrop provides a simple mechanism which lets anyone create links to "claim" keys for free!
item.dc:creator: Julien Genestoux

item.title: ETHWaterloo Tickets
item.description: We're proud to announce that ETHGlobal is using Unlock's ticket application for its ETHWaterloo hackathon, for crypto and non crypto usersÂ alike!
item.dc:creator: Julien Genestoux

item.title: The Graph
item.description: Using the Graph Protocol for faster iteration on Ethereum based products
item.dc:creator: Akeem Adeniji

item.title: Unlock User Accounts
item.description: Unlock Inc. provides a way for users without crypto wallets to buy keys to locks on the Unlock protocol. For this we introduce managed user accounts as well as payment via Credit Card.
item.dc:creator: Christopher Nascone

item.title: Wordpress Plugin
item.description: Wordpress.org is the most popular Content Management System. Adding a lock to your site lets you monetize the words you write without asking anyone's permission!
item.dc:creator: Julien Genestoux

item.title: Event Sponsorship!
item.description: Today, we're excited to announce a broad sponsorship effort for anyone who uses tickets to organize an Ethereum or Bitcoin related event for any event until December 31st 2019.
item.dc:creator: Julien Genestoux

item.title: Unlock Donations
item.description: A sponsor or a donor is a member of a unique club; the club of people and organizations which help someone do their work "for free" for the rest of the world. Unlock can easily be used to create sponsorships!
item.dc:creator: Julien Genestoux

item.title: A blue check-mark NFT
item.description: Locks are the core of the Unlock protocol. They are smart contracts deployed on the Ethereum chain which lets your community become members by purchasing keys to your lock.
item.dc:creator: Julien Genestoux

item.title: Unlocking Scout
item.description: Our friends at Scout have integrated Unlock on the Unlock dashboard. Here's how it works
item.dc:creator: Julien Genestoux

item.title: Introducing Tickets
item.description: Now you can buy tickets to real-world events using Ethereum and the Unlock Protocol.
item.dc:creator: Ben Werdmuller

item.title: Unlock this blog
item.description: We've put a lock on our own blog! Members can leave comments, read exclusive content and will receive a Non Fungible Token.
item.dc:creator: Julien Genestoux

item.title: Creating your first lock
item.description: Locks are the core of the Unlock protocol. They are smart contracts deployed on the Ethereum chain which lets your community become members by purchasing keys to your lock.
item.dc:creator: Julien Genestoux

item.title: Integrating Unlock with React
item.description: Integrating Unlock with React is straighforward! Here's a quick tutorial on how to get there!
item.dc:creator: Julien Genestoux

item.title: Integrating Unlock with Known
item.description: The Unlock API is flexible and easy to use. Now any Known user can use Unlock on their website with a simple plugin. Here's how we did it.
item.dc:creator: Ben Werdmuller

item.title: Digital Cash. Big Deal.
item.description: A quick exploration into blockchain wallets, their applications and why they're so powerful.
item.dc:creator: Sascha Mombartz

item.title: Mission, Vision and Values
item.description: Identifying Mission, Vision and Values informs business strategy and paints a holistic and accurate picture of a business.
item.dc:creator: Julien Genestoux

item.title: Non Fungible Tokens at Betaworks Studios
item.description: Non Fungible are one of the largest emerging token categories in the crypto asset world. We presented an intro to them at Betaworks Studios!
item.dc:creator: Julien Genestoux

item.title: A Protocol for Membership
item.description: The Unlock protocol provides a way for people to show their support and access exclusive content, features, or even status. It is a web-native way for creators to monetize their work.
item.dc:creator: Julien Genestoux

item.title: Introducing ERC20 Locks
item.description: A lot of the creators that we spoke with were concerned by the volatile nature of Ether when using it to price their keys: we needed to support stable coins. The ERC20 standard is a way to create tokens which are all compatible, even though they may have different implementations.
item.dc:creator: Julien Genestoux

item.title: Multi Use Locks
item.description: Find out how a single key together with your wallet can unlock anything from tickets to content.
item.dc:creator: Sascha Mombartz

item.title: NFT Dev Meetup
item.description: More info and a livestream for registred participants.
item.dc:creator: Sascha Mombartz

item.title: Crypto First
item.description: At Unlock, like many in the crypto and blockchain world, we believe that a better web is possible... and we're building it. But we also understand that dreaming and building is not enough.
item.dc:creator: Julien Genestoux

item.title: Hello Optimistic Unlocking
item.description: Introducing Optimistic Unlocking, which overcomes the slow confirmation times and provides a better user experience for blockchain transactions.
item.dc:creator: Sascha Mombartz

item.title: Ways to Unlock the Web
item.description: Weâre building an open protocol to allow anyone on the web to earn money from their work. The possibilities are endless. Here are some of them.

item.title: Announcing Unlock Version Zero
item.description: Weâre changing the business model for the web. It starts here, today.

item.title: The End of the Ad-Supported Web
item.description: What if we got the business model of the web wrong?
item.dc:creator: Julien Genestoux

item.title: To Save Freedom of Speech, We Must Decentralize the Web
item.description: In a world where corporations control our conversations, removing middlemen is more important than ever.
item.dc:creator: Ben Werdmuller

item.title: Unlocking Some Exciting News
item.description: Weâre growing our talented and mission-driven team. Come join us!

item.title: Setting Unlockâs demo free
item.description: Today weâre sharing the very first demo of the Unlock Protocol.
